entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Delegate invocation can be simplified" crashes on top-level statements #76423
  • "Delegate invocation can be simplified" is shown on non-delegates #76422

Closed

  • IDE0260 code fixer produces invalid code (CS0165) #76372
    Backlog
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Replace `.Where(x => x is T)` for `.OfType<T>()` #74968
  • Extract Method in file with top-level statements results in compile error #65465
    Backlog
  • "Extract Method" introduces an invalid nullability annotation that results in a nullability issue in the extracted code #61555
    Backlog
  • Load roslyn version of the codestyle analyzers to fix torn load state (causes ReflectionTypeLoadException) #72811
    17.12
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35612.190 #76416
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35612.71 #76410

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid focus changes during argument provider tests #76424
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move code in extract method to shared location #76421
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Inline hints - fixes bug where hints repeat #76420
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge VB "Overload Resolution Priority" feature to main #76419
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • Reduce allocations again in ComputeReverseReferencesMap #76417
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Call Enter/LeaveRegion APIs for binary expressions #76412
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Simplify parsing #76411
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Slightly reduce allocations in SymbolCompletionItem.AddSymbolInfo #76418
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Change PR Val builds to be unsigned #76358
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add two more cases for 'simplify linq expression'. #76413
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Small reduction in allocations in DateAndTimeLanguageDetector #76393
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Mark interceptors feature as stable and deprecate file path based attributes #76312
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Interceptors, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2600919 #76415
    auto-merge
  • Fix issue with 'use pattern matching' where it would cause a variable to not be considered assigned #76407
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Rename 'scopeOfTheContainingExpression' to 'localScopeDepth' #76400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Make extracted parameters non-nullable when possible. #76386
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Report inappropriate OverloadResolutionPriority attribute applications #76385
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • Optimize ProjectDependencyGraph.DoesProjectTransitivelyDependOnProject #76399
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix TFM inconsistency in BuildHost #76354
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Cache the compilation states in compilation order to avoid recalculation #76380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to release/dev17.13 #76414
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update LOC branch to 17.13 #76408
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Dictionary expressions: initial binding and lowering support #76257
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Do honor abstract required during state initialization in nullable #76363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • feat(lsp): add --pipe parameter #76351
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #76387
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add spec for the data section string literals feature flag #76139
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Remove scope variance exceptions #76296
    Area-Compilers
